data.name: LZW Compression (and decompression)
data.description:
## Task
You need to implement 2 functions, `compress` and `decompress` that use the LZW compression algorithm. The compressed/decompressed value should be returned **as a String**.

## Input
- The input will always be a single string containing the standard characters found on a keyboard
- The input may be empty

## Examples
- `banana_bandana` should be converted to and from `banāa_Āndă`
- `Bacon ipsum dolor amet sausage leberkas strip steak short loin` should be converted to and from `Bacon ipsum dolor amet sauÄge leberkasÄtrÄÄ¦eakÄhÄÄÄin.`

## Links
Below are several links that outline the LZW algorithm and how to go about implementing it:

- http://web.mit.edu/6.02/www/s2012/handouts/3.pdf
- https://www.cs.duke.edu/csed/curious/compression/lzw.html
- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lempel%E2%80%93Ziv%E2%80%93Welch
